vosizneias.com/2015/04/new-york-jewish-o.snippet: New York - Jewish leaders in New York have written a letter to state lawmakers that will run in Jewish publications fighting the legalization of mixed martial arts, stating the legalization supports an anti-Israel government.

newyork.cbslocal.com/2015/03/ap-new-york.title: AP: New York Senate Set To Back Legalizing Mixed Martial Arts...
newyork.cbslocal.com/2015/03/ap-new-york.snippet: The New York Senate is set to vote for the fifth straight year for legalizing professional mixed martial arts and end the state's position as the last one prohibiting the sport.
